#Text=We 're starting from here ...  Aang says : " No , we 're over on this island .

column1: #Text=" Toph says : " You noodle - brains do n't know what you 're doing .
#Text=" Katara says : " Ooh , I got one : if you miss him so much , why do n't you marry him ?
#Text=" Piandao says : " You 've had a good first day of training .
#Text=But I thought I messed up every single thing we worked on !
#Text=" Piandao says : " You messed things up in a very special way .
#Text=You are ready for a real sword .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Are you giving me one of yours ?
#Text=" Piandao says : " Your sword must be an extension of yourself .
#Text=So tomorrow , you will make your own sword .
